name: Drax
description: Created by the Titan god Kronos to kill Thanos, Drax the Destroyer has spent most of his existence trying to do exactly that. Despite this one underlying purpose, Drax has fought to save the universe time and time again. Following his efforts to stop the Annihilation wave, he joined the Guardians of the Galaxy, and he continues to fight to protect the innocent and pursue his quest to slay the Mad Titan Thanos.
